title: WTB T206 Bay, Bender, Bowerman, Bransfield, Bridwell
author: BleedinBlue

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Bay, Bender, Bowerman, Bransfield, Bridwell
posts.post_content:
Working on the T206 set very slowly right now.  Basically an abbreviated letter-by-letter approach.  Right now I'm looking for a handful of T206's and haven't seen these come up in a while.  Anybody have any of the following 5 cards in PSA 3-4 range?

Bay
Bender (No Trees)
Bowerman
Bransfield
[STRIKE]Brashear[/STRIKE] - purchased!! Thanks Pete
[STRIKE]Breitenstein[/STRIKE] - purchased!! Thanks eBay
Bridwell (with cap)

These are the next 5 on my list and if I pick any of these up I'll add the next cards to replace them.

Thanks in advance,

Brian

bumping this thread to update the list.  I picked up Brashear.  Breitenstein now added to the list.  Any help?

Brian

Hey Brian,

I have been doing the same thing as you for almost a year now.  I had started my T206 collection by picking up whatever I needed with very little focus.  I know focused my collection to the first 100 cards with an emphasis on the first 50.  I only collect SGC50 or better (No PSA).  I will tell you from experience that the Bay is very tough.  If you find one, you will pay more than you think.  I also think that Bender and Breitenstein are very difficult as well and again, the price will be high.

Good Luck!

Hey Brian- When we spoke, I said the same thing that Phil just mentioned. This is a great way to go in making your set & wish you the best of luck in completing as much of the set as you can. Let me know if you need any assistance.
